# ddplugin release notes

## 1.0.3 (2021-01-01)

Enhancements:

* Added support for Ruby 3.0

Changes:

* Dropped support for Ruby 2.3 and 2.4 (both EOL)

## 1.0.2 (2018-03-31)

Enhancements:

* Made it possible to pass strings instead of symbols (#4)

## 1.0.1 (2017-02-28)

Fixes:

* Made `.all` not return duplicates (#3)

## 1.0 (2016-11-27)

Initial release.
